arts.ttl: Man Utd's striker shambles: Zirkzee dream, Gyokeres push, Kolo Muani threat
arts.sum: Man Utd's striker shambles: Zirkzee dream, Gyokeres push, Kolo Muani threat On Wednesday, reports surfaced claiming that Ruben Amorim, who previously insisted that he would not sign Sporting CP players in January, had begun demanding Man Utd move for Viktor Gyokeres this month.

arts.ttl: Gyokeres SPEEDS UP transfer with radical decision
arts.sum: Viktor Gyokeres is ready to push to leaving Sporting CP in the January transfer window, with numerous clubs, including Arsenal, Manchester United and Chelsea all interested in the striker. Having been coveted by Arsenal and Chelsea in the summer of 2024, the interest of these two Premier League giants persists, while Ruben Amorim’s move from Lisbon to become head coach at Manchester United has further ignited the race, with claims that the Sweden international could join his former mentor at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Man Utd eye £80m Gyokeres in January - Thursday's gossip
arts.sum: Struggling Manchester United will try to sign Viktor Gyokeres this month, Real Madrid remain on track to sign Trent Alexander-Arnold, and Arsenal are favourites to sign Omar Marmoush.

arts.ttl: Manchester United learn Viktor Gyokeres price after Ruben Amorim 'makes January demand'
arts.sum: United could step up interest in Sporting hitman as Amorim seeks new signings

arts.ttl: Five Man United players who could leave in January to fund spectacular Viktor Gyokeres swoop
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at five players who could leave Manchester United this month, as the Red Devils attempt to raise funds to move for Sporting Lisbon's Viktor Gyokeres.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim 'makes Viktor Gyokeres transfer demand' with Red Devils 'set for busy January'
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim allegedly wants his club to sign Sporting Lisbon striker Viktor Gyokeres during the January transfer window.
